resourcedefs.name: Notification Storing When Disabled or Offline
Binding
resourcedefs.range: The possible values of Resource are listed in 5.2.1.1

name: Digital Input
description: Generic digital input for non-specific sensors

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input State
resourcedefs.description: The current state of a digital input.

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input Counter
resourcedefs.description: The cumulative value of active state detected.

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input Polarity
resourcedefs.description: The polarity of the digital input as a boolean (0 = Normal, 1= Reversed)

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input Debounce
resourcedefs.description: The debounce period in ms. .

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input Edge Selection
resourcedefs.description: The edge selection as an integer (1 = Falling edge, 2 = Rising edge, 3 = Both Rising and Falling edge).

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input Counter Reset
resourcedefs.description: Reset the Counter value.

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string, for instance, “Air Pressure”

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Type
resourcedefs.description: The type of the sensor (for instance PIR type)

name: Digital Output
description: Generic digital output for non-specific actuators

resourcedefs.name: Digital Output State
resourcedefs.description: The current state of a digital output.

resourcedefs.name: Digital Output Polarity
resourcedefs.description: The polarity of a digital ouput as a boolean (0 = Normal, 1= Reversed).

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the output as a string, for instance, “LED”

name: Analog Input
description: Generic analog input for non-specific sensors

resourcedefs.name: Analog Input Current Value
resourcedefs.description: The current value of the analog input.

resourcedefs.name: Min Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.name: Max Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.name: Min Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Max Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string, for instance, “Air Pressure”

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Type
resourcedefs.description: The type of the sensor, for instance PIR type

resourcedefs.name: Reset Min and Max Measured Values
resourcedefs.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

name: Analog Output
description: This IPSO object is a generic object that can be used with any kind of analog output interface.

resourcedefs.name: Analog Output Current Value
resourcedefs.description: The current state of the analogue output.

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: If present, the application type of the actuator as a string, for instance, “Thermostat”

resourcedefs.name: Min Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Max Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

name: Generic Sensor
description:
This IPSO object allow the description of a generic sensor. It is based on the description of a value and a unit according to the UCUM specification. Thus, any type of value defined within this specification can be reporting using this object.
Specific object for a given range of sensors is described later in the document, enabling to identify the type of sensors directly from its Object ID. This object may be used as a generic object if a dedicated one does not exist.

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Value
resourcedefs.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Units
resourcedefs.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celsius.

resourcedefs.name: Min Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.name: Max Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.name: Min Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Max Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: If present, the application type of the sensor as a string, for instance, “CO2”

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Type
resourcedefs.description: The type of the sensor (for instance PIR type)

resourcedefs.name: Reset Min and Max Measured Values
resourcedefs.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

name: Illuminance
description: Illuminance sensor, example units = lx

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Value
resourcedefs.description: The current value of the luminosity sensor.

resourcedefs.name: Min Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.name: Max Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.name: Min Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Max Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Reset Min and Max Measured Values
resourcedefs.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Units
resourcedefs.description: If present, the type of sensor defined as the UCUM Unit Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celcius.

name: Presence
description: Presence sensor with digital sensing, optional delay parameters

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input State
resourcedefs.description: The current state of the presence sensor

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input Counter
resourcedefs.description: The cumulative value of active state detected.

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input Counter Reset
resourcedefs.description: Reset the Counter value

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Type
resourcedefs.description: The type of the sensor (for instance PIR type)

resourcedefs.name: Busy to Clear delay
resourcedefs.description: Delay from the detection state to the clear state in ms

resourcedefs.name: Clear to Busy delay
resourcedefs.description: Delay from the clear state to the busy state in ms

name: Temperature
description: Description: This IPSO object should be used with a temperature sensor to report a temperature measurement.  It also provides resources for minimum/maximum measured values and the minimum/maximum range that can be measured by the temperature sensor. An example measurement unit is degrees Celsius (ucum:Cel).

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Value
resourcedefs.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

resourcedefs.name: Min Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.name: Max Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.name: Min Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Max Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Units
resourcedefs.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celsius.

resourcedefs.name: Reset Min and Max Measured Values
resourcedefs.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

name: Humidity
description: Description: This IPSO object should be used with a humidity sensor to report a humidity measurement.  It also provides resources for minimum/maximum measured values and the minimum/maximum range that can be measured by the humidity sensor. An example measurement unit is relative humidity as a percentage (ucum:%).

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Value
resourcedefs.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

resourcedefs.name: Min Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.name: Max Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.name: Min Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Max Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Units
resourcedefs.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celsius.

resourcedefs.name: Reset Min and Max Measured Values
resourcedefs.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

name: Power Measurement
description: This IPSO object should be used over a power measurement sensor to report a remote power measurement.  It also provides resources for minimum/maximum measured values and the minimum/maximum range for both active and reactive power. Il also provides resources for cumulative energy, calibration, and the power factor.

resourcedefs.name: Instantaneous active power
resourcedefs.description: The current active power

resourcedefs.name: Min Measured active power
resourcedefs.description: The minimum active power measured by the sensor since it is ON

resourcedefs.name: Max Measured  active power
resourcedefs.description: The maximum active power measured by the sensor since it is ON

resourcedefs.name: Min Range active power
resourcedefs.description: The minimum active power that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Max Range active power
resourcedefs.description: The maximum active power that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Cumulative active power
resourcedefs.description: The cumulative active power since the last cumulative energy reset or device start

resourcedefs.name: Active Power Calibration
resourcedefs.description: Request an active power calibration by writing the value of a calibrated load.

resourcedefs.name: Instantaneous reactive power
resourcedefs.description: The current reactive power

resourcedefs.name: Min Measured reactive power
resourcedefs.description: The minimum reactive power measured by the sensor since it is ON

resourcedefs.name: Max Measured reactive power
resourcedefs.description: The maximum reactive power measured by the sensor since it is ON

resourcedefs.name: Min Range reactive power
resourcedefs.description: The minimum active power that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Max Range reactive power
resourcedefs.description: The maximum reactive power that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Cumulative reactive power
resourcedefs.description: The cumulative reactive power since the last cumulative energy reset or device start

resourcedefs.name: Reactive Power Calibration
resourcedefs.description: Request a reactive power calibration by writing the value of a calibrated load.

resourcedefs.name: Power Factor
resourcedefs.description: If applicable, the power factor of the current consumption.

resourcedefs.name: Current Calibration
resourcedefs.description: Read or Write the current calibration coefficient

resourcedefs.name: Reset Cumulative energy
resourcedefs.description: Reset both cumulative active/reactive power

resourcedefs.name: Reset Min and Max Measured Values
resourcedefs.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

name: Actuation
description: This IPSO object is dedicated to remote actuation such as ON/OFF action or dimming. A multi-state output can also be described as a string. This is useful to send pilot wire orders for instance. It also provides a resource to reflect the time that the device has been switched on.

resourcedefs.name: On/Off
resourcedefs.description: On/Off

resourcedefs.name: Dimmer
resourcedefs.description: This resource represents a light dimmer setting, which has an integer value between 0 and 100 as a percentage.

resourcedefs.name: On Time
resourcedefs.description: The time in seconds that the device has been on. Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.

resourcedefs.name: Muti-state Output
resourcedefs.description: A string describing a state for multiple level output such as Pilot Wire

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The Application type of the device, for example “Motion Closure”.

name: Set Point
description: Description: This IPSO object should be used to set a desired value to a controller, such as a thermostat. This object enables a setpoint to be expressed units defined in the UCUM specification, to match an associated sensor or measurement value. A special resource is added to set the colour of an object.

resourcedefs.name: Set Point Value
resourcedefs.description: The setpoint value.

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Units
resourcedefs.description: If present, the type of sensor defined as the UCUM Unit Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celcius.

resourcedefs.name: Colour
resourcedefs.description: A string representing a value in some color space

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The Application type of the device, for example “Motion Closure”.

name: Load Control
description: Description: This Object is used for demand-response load control and other load control in automation application (not limited to power).

resourcedefs.name: Event Identifier
resourcedefs.description: The event identifier as a string.

resourcedefs.name: Start Time
resourcedefs.description: Time when the load control event will start started.

resourcedefs.name: Duration In Min
resourcedefs.description: The duration of the load control event.

resourcedefs.name: Criticality Level
resourcedefs.description: The criticality of the event.  The device receiving the event will react in an appropriate fashion for the device.

resourcedefs.name: Avg Load Adj Pct
resourcedefs.description: Defines the maximum energy usage of the receivng device, as a percentage of the device's normal maximum energy usage.

resourcedefs.name: Duty Cycle
resourcedefs.description: Defines the duty cycle for the load control event, i.e, what percentage of time the receiving device is allowed to be on.

name: Light Control
description: Description: This Object is used to control a light source, such as a LED or other light.  It allows a light to be turned on or off and its dimmer setting to be control as a % between 0 and 100. An optional colour setting enables a string to be used to indicate the desired colour.

resourcedefs.name: On/Off
resourcedefs.description: This resource represents a light, which can be controlled, the setting of which is a boolean value (1,0) where 1 is on and 0 is off.

resourcedefs.name: Dimmer
resourcedefs.description: This resource represents a light dimmer setting, which has an integer value between 0 and 100 as a percentage.

resourcedefs.name: On Time
resourcedefs.description: The time in seconds that the light has been on. Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.

resourcedefs.name: Cumulative active power
resourcedefs.description: The total power in Wh that the light has used.

resourcedefs.name: Power Factor
resourcedefs.description: The power factor of the light.

resourcedefs.name: Colour
resourcedefs.description: A string representing a value in some color space

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Units
resourcedefs.description: If present, the type of sensor defined as the UCUM Unit Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celcius.

name: Power Control
description: Description: This Object is used to control a power source, such as a Smart Plug.  It allows a power relay to be turned on or off and its dimmer setting to be control as a % between 0 and 100.

resourcedefs.name: On/Off
resourcedefs.description: This resource represents a power relay, which can be controlled, the setting of which is a boolean value (1,0) where 1 is on and 0 is off.

resourcedefs.name: Dimmer
resourcedefs.description: This resource represents a power dimmer setting, which has an integer value between 0 and 100 as a percentage.

resourcedefs.name: On Time
resourcedefs.description: The time in seconds that the power relay has been on. Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.

resourcedefs.name: Cumulative active power
resourcedefs.description: The total power in Wh that has been used by the load.

resourcedefs.name: Power Factor
resourcedefs.description: The power factor of the load.

name: Accelerometer
description: Description: This IPSO object can be used to represent a 1-3 axis accelerometer.

resourcedefs.name: X Value
resourcedefs.description: The measured value along the X axis.

resourcedefs.name: Y Value
resourcedefs.description: The measured value along the Y axis.

resourcedefs.name: Z Value
resourcedefs.description: The measured value along the Z axis.

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Units
resourcedefs.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celsius.

resourcedefs.name: Min Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Max Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

name: Magnetometer
description: Description: This IPSO object can be used to represent a 1-3 axis magnetometer with optional compass direction.

resourcedefs.name: X Value
resourcedefs.description: The measured value along the X axis.

resourcedefs.name: Y Value
resourcedefs.description: The measured value along the Y axis.

resourcedefs.name: Z Value
resourcedefs.description: The measured value along the Z axis.

resourcedefs.name: Compass Direction
resourcedefs.description: The compass direction

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Units
resourcedefs.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celsius.

name: Barometer
description: Description: This IPSO object should be used with an air pressure sensor to report a barometer measurement.  It also provides resources for minimum/maximum measured values and the minimum/maximum range that can be measured by the barometer sensor. An example measurement unit is kPa (ucum:kPa).

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Value
resourcedefs.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

resourcedefs.name: Min Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.name: Max Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.name: Min Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Max Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Units
resourcedefs.description: If present, the type of sensor defined as the UCUM Unit Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celcius.

resourcedefs.name: Reset Min and Max Measured Values
resourcedefs.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

name: Voltage
description: This IPSO object should be used with voltmeter sensor to report measured voltage between two points.  It also provides resources for minimum and maximum measured values, as well as the minimum and maximum range that can be measured by the sensor. An example measurement unit is volts (ucum: V).

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Value
resourcedefs.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Units
resourcedefs.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celsius

resourcedefs.name: Min Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.name: Max Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.name: Min Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Max Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Reset Min and Max Measured Values
resourcedefs.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

resourcedefs.name: Current Calibration
resourcedefs.description: Read or Write the current calibration coefficient

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case

name: Current
description: This IPSO object should be used with an ammeter to report measured electric current in amperes. It also provides resources for minimum and maximum measured values, as well as the minimum and maximum range that can be measured by the sensor. An example measurement unit is volts (ucum: A).

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Value
resourcedefs.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Units
resourcedefs.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celsius

resourcedefs.name: Min Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.name: Max Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.description: Read or Write the current calibration coefficient

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case

name: Frequency
description: This IPSO object should be used to report frequency measurements. It also provides resources for minimum and maximum measured values, as well as the minimum and maximum range that can be measured by the sensor. An example measurement unit is volts (ucum: Hz).

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Value
resourcedefs.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Units
resourcedefs.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celsius

name: Depth
description: This IPSO object should be used to report depth measurements. It can, for example, be used to describe a generic rain gauge that measures the accumulated rainfall in millimetres (mm) or in fathoms (fth).

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Value
resourcedefs.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Units
resourcedefs.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celsius

resourcedefs.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case

name: Percentage
description: This IPSO object should can be used to report measurements relative to a 0-100% scale. For example it could be used to measure the level of a liquid in a vessel or container in units of %.

name: Altitude
description: This IPSO object should be used with an altitude sensor to report altitude above sea level in meters. Note that Altitude can be calculated from the measured pressure given the local sea level pressure.  It also provides resources for minimum and maximum measured values, as well as the minimum and maximum range that can be measured by the sensor. An example measurement unit is meters (ucum: m).

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Value
resourcedefs.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Units
resourcedefs.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celsius

resourcedefs.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.name: Max Measured Value

resourcedefs.description: Read or Write the current calibration coefficient

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case

name: Load
description: This IPSO object should be used with a load sensor (as in a scale) to report the applied weight or force. It also provides resources for minimum and maximum measured values, as well as the minimum and maximum range that can be measured by the sensor. An example measurement unit is kilograms (ucum: Kg).

name: Pressure
description: This IPSO object should be used to report pressure measurements. It also provides resources for minimum and maximum measured values, as well as the minimum and maximum range that can be measured by the sensor. An example measurement unit is pascals (ucum: Pa).

name: Loudness
description: This IPSO object should be used to report loudness or noise level measurements. It also provides resources for minimum and maximum measured values, as well as the minimum and maximum range that can be measured by the sensor. An example measurement unit is decibels (ucum: dB).

name: Concentration
description: This IPSO object should be used to the particle concentration measurement of a medium. It also provides resources for minimum and maximum measured values, as well as the minimum and maximum range that can be measured by the sensor. An example measurement unit is parts per million  (ucum: ppm).

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Value
resourcedefs.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Units
resourcedefs.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celsius

resourcedefs.name: Min Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.name: Max Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.name: Min Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Max Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Reset Min and Max Measured Values
resourcedefs.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

resourcedefs.name: Current Calibration
resourcedefs.description: Read or Write the current calibration coefficient

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case

name: Acidity
description: This IPSO object should be used to report an acidity measurement of a liquid. It also provides resources for minimum and maximum measured values, as well as the minimum and maximum range that can be measured by the sensor. An example measurement unit is pH.

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Value
resourcedefs.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Units
resourcedefs.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celsius

name: Conductivity
description: This IPSO object should be used to report a measurement of the electric conductivity of a medium or sample. It also provides resources for minimum and maximum measured values, as well as the minimum and maximum range that can be measured by the sensor. An example measurement unit is Siemens (ucum: S).

name: Power
description: This IPSO object should be used to report power measurements. It also provides resources for minimum and maximum measured values, as well as the minimum and maximum range that can be measured by the sensor. An example measurement unit is Watts (ucum: W). This resource may be used for either real power or apparent power (units= ucum:VA) measurements. The Application type can be use for reactive power or active power for example.

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Value
resourcedefs.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

name: Power Factor
description: This IPSO object should be used to report a measurement or calculation of the power factor of a reactive electrical load. Power Factor is normally the ratio of non-reactive power to total power. This object also provides resources for minimum and maximum measured values, as well as the minimum and maximum range that can be measured by the sensor.

name: Distance
description: This IPSO object should be used to report a distance measurement. It also provides resources for minimum and maximum measured values, as well as the minimum and maximum range that can be measured by the sensor. An example measurement unit is Meters (ucum: m).

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Value
resourcedefs.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Units
resourcedefs.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celsius

name: Energy
description: This IPSO object should be used to report energy consumption (Cumulative Power) of an electrical load. An example measurement unit is Watt Hours (ucum:W*h).

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Value
resourcedefs.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor.

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Units
resourcedefs.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celsius.

resourcedefs.name: Reset Cumulative Energy
resourcedefs.description: Reset both cumulative active/reactive power.

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

name: Direction
description: This IPSO object is used to report the direction indicated by a compass, wind vane, or other directional indicator. The units of measure is plane angle degrees (ucum:deg).

resourcedefs.name: Compass Direction
resourcedefs.description: This indicates the compass direction of some phenomenon (i.e. direction of travel, wind direction…).

resourcedefs.name: Min Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset.

resourcedefs.name: Max Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset.

resourcedefs.name: Reset Min and Max Measured Values
resourcedefs.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value.

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

name: time
description: This IPSO object is used to report the current time in seconds since January 1, 1970 UTC. There is also a fractional time counter that has a range of less than one second.

resourcedefs.name: Current Time
resourcedefs.description: Unix Time. A signed integer representing the number of seconds since Jan 1st, 1970 in the UTC time zone.

resourcedefs.name: Fractional Time
resourcedefs.description: For shorter times of a fraction of a second (i.e. 0.23).

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

name: Gyrometer
description: This IPSO Object is used to report the current reading of a gyrometer sensor in 3 axes. It provides tracking of the minimum and maximum angular rate in all 3 axes. An example unit of measure is radians per second (ucum:rad/s).

resourcedefs.name: X Value
resourcedefs.description: The measured value along the X axis.

resourcedefs.name: Y Value
resourcedefs.description: The measured value along the Y axis.

resourcedefs.name: Z Value
resourcedefs.description: The measured value along the Z axis.

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Units
resourcedefs.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celsius.

resourcedefs.name: Min X Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum measured value along the X axis

resourcedefs.name: Max X Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum measured value along the X axis

resourcedefs.name: Min Y Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum measured value along the Y axis

resourcedefs.name: Max Y Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum measured value along the Y axis

resourcedefs.name: Min Z Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum measured value along the Z axis

resourcedefs.name: Max Z Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum measured value along the Z axis

resourcedefs.name: Reset Min and Max Measured Values
resourcedefs.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value.

resourcedefs.name: Min Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Max Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

name: Colour
description: This IPSO object should be used to report the measured value of a colour sensor in some colour space described by the units resource.

resourcedefs.name: Colour
resourcedefs.description: A string representing a value in some colour space.

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Units
resourcedefs.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celsius.

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

name: Location
description: This IPSO object represents GPS coordinates. This object is compatible with the LWM2M management object for location, but uses reusable resources.

resourcedefs.name: Latitude
resourcedefs.description: The decimal notation of latitude, e.g. -43.5723 (World Geodetic System 1984).

resourcedefs.name: Longitude
resourcedefs.description: The decimal notation of longitude, e.g. 153.21760 (World Geodetic System 1984).

resourcedefs.name: Uncertainty
resourcedefs.description: The accuracy of the position in meters.

resourcedefs.name: Compass Direction
resourcedefs.description: Measured Direction.

resourcedefs.name: Velocity
resourcedefs.description: The velocity of the device as defined in 3GPP 23.032 GAD specification. This set of values may not be available if the device is static.

resourcedefs.name: Timestamp
resourcedefs.description: The timestamp of when the location measurement was performed.

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

name: Positioner
description: This IPSO object should be used with a generic position actuator from 0 to 100%. This resource optionally allows setting the transition time for an operation that changes the position of the actuator, and for reading the remaining time of the currently active transition.

resourcedefs.name: Current Position
resourcedefs.description: Current position or desired position of a positioner actuator.

resourcedefs.name: Transition Time
resourcedefs.description: The time expected to move the actuator to the new position.

resourcedefs.name: Remaining Time
resourcedefs.description: The time remaining in an operation.

resourcedefs.name: Min Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value set on the actuator since power ON or reset.

resourcedefs.name: Max Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value set on the actuator since power ON or reset.

resourcedefs.name: Reset Min and Max Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value.

resourcedefs.name: Min Limit
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor.

resourcedefs.name: Max Limit
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor.

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

name: Buzzer
description: This IPSO object should be used to actuate an audible alarm such as a buzzer, beeper, or vibration alarm. There is a dimmer control for setting the relative loudness of the alarm, and an optional duration control to limit the length of time the alarm sounds when turned on. Each time a “1” is written to the On/Off resource, the alarm will sound again for the configured duration. If no duration is programmed or the setting is zero, writing a “1” to the On/Off resource will result in the alarm sounding continuously until a “0” is written to the On/Off resource.

resourcedefs.name: On/Off
resourcedefs.description: On/Off control, 0=OFF, 1=ON.

resourcedefs.name: Dimmer
resourcedefs.description: Proportional control, integer value between 0 and 100 as a percentage.

resourcedefs.name: Delay Duration
resourcedefs.description: The duration of the time delay.

resourcedefs.name: Minimum Off-time
resourcedefs.description: The off time when On/Off control remains on.

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

name: Audio Clip
description: This IPSO object should be used for a speaker that plays a pre-recorded audio clip or an audio output that is sent elsewhere. For example, an elevator which announces the floor of the building. A resource is provided to store the clip, a dimmer resource controls the relative sound level of the playback, and a duration resource limits the maximum playback time. After the duration time is reached, any remaining samples in the clip are ignored, and the clip player will be ready to play another clip.

resourcedefs.name: Clip
resourcedefs.description: Audio Clip that is playable (i.e. short audio recording indicating the floor in an elevator).

resourcedefs.name: Trigger
resourcedefs.description: Trigger initiating actuation.

resourcedefs.name: Dimmer
resourcedefs.description: Proportional control, integer value between 0 and 100 as a percentage.

resourcedefs.name: Duration
resourcedefs.description: The duration of the sound once trigger.

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

name: Timer
description: This IPSO object is used to time events and actions, using patterns common to industrial timers. A POST to the trigger resource or On/Off input state change starts the timing operation, and the timer remaining time shows zero when the operation is complete. The patterns supported are One-Shot (mode 1), On-Time or Interval (mode 2), Time delay on pick-up or TDPU (tmode 3), and Time Delay on Drop-Out or TDDO (mode 4). Mode 0 disables the timer, so the output follows the input with no delay. A counter is provided to count occurrences of the timer output changing from 0 to 1. Writing a value of zero resets the counter. The Digital Input State resource reports the state of the timer output.

resourcedefs.name: Duration
resourcedefs.description: The duration of the time delay.

resourcedefs.name: Remaining Time
resourcedefs.description: The time remaining in an operation.

resourcedefs.name: Minimum Off-time
resourcedefs.description: The duration of the rearm delay (i.e. the delay from the end of one cycle until the beginning of the next, the inhibit time).

resourcedefs.name: Trigger
resourcedefs.description: Trigger initiating actuation.

resourcedefs.name: On/Off
resourcedefs.description: On/off control for the timer input, 0=OFF, 1=ON.

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input Counter
resourcedefs.description: The number of times the input.

resourcedefs.name: Cumulative Time
resourcedefs.description: The total time in seconds that the timer input is true. Writing a 0 resets the time.

resourcedefs.name: Digital State
resourcedefs.description: The current state of the timer output.

resourcedefs.name: Counter
resourcedefs.description: Counts the number of times the timer output transitions from 0 to 1.

resourcedefs.name: Mode
resourcedefs.description: Type of timer pattern used by the patterns.

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

name: Addressable Text Display
description: This IPSO object is used to send text to a text-only or text mode graphics display. POSTing a string of text to the text resource causes it to be displayed at the selected X and Y locations on the display. If X or Y are set to a value greater than the size of the display, the position “wraps around” to the modulus of the setting and the display size. Likewise, if the text string overflows the display size, the text “wraps around” and displays on the next line down or, if the last line has been written, wraps around to the top of the display. Brightness and Contrast controls are provided to allow control of various display types including STN and DSTN type LCD character displays. POSTing an empty payload to the Clear Display resource causes the display to be erased.

resourcedefs.name: Text
resourcedefs.description: A string of text.

resourcedefs.name: X Coordinate
resourcedefs.description: X Coordinate.

resourcedefs.name: Y Coordinate
resourcedefs.description: Y Coordinate.

resourcedefs.name: Max X Coordinate
resourcedefs.description: The highest X coordinate the display supports before wrapping to the next line.

resourcedefs.name: Max Y Coordinate
resourcedefs.description: The highest Y coordinate the display supports before wrapping to the next line.

resourcedefs.name: Clear Display
resourcedefs.description: Command to clear the display.

resourcedefs.name: Dimmer
resourcedefs.description: Proportional control, integer value between 0 and 100 as a percentage.

resourcedefs.name: Contrast
resourcedefs.description: Proportional control, integer value between 0 and 100 as a percentage.

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

name: On/Off switch
description: This IPSO object should be used with an On/Off switch to report the state of the switch.

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input State
resourcedefs.description: The current state of a digital input.

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input Counter
resourcedefs.description: The number of times the input transitions from 0 to 1.

resourcedefs.name: On Time
resourcedefs.description: The time in seconds since the On command was sent. Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.

resourcedefs.name: Off Time
resourcedefs.description: The time in seconds since the Off command was sent. Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

name: Dimmer
description: This IPSO object should be used with a dimmer or level control to report the state of the control.

resourcedefs.name: Dimmer
resourcedefs.description: Proportional control, integer value between 0 and 100 as a percentage.

resourcedefs.name: On Time
resourcedefs.description: The time in seconds that the dimmer has been on (Dimmer value has to be > 0). Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.

resourcedefs.name: Off Time
resourcedefs.description: The time in seconds that the dimmer has been off  (dimmer value less or equal to 0) Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case

name: Up/Down Control
description: This IPSO object is used to report the state of an up/down control element like a pair of push buttons or a rotary encoder. Counters for increase and decrease operations are provided for counting pulses from a quadrature encoder.

resourcedefs.name: Increase Input State
resourcedefs.description: Indicates an increase control action.

resourcedefs.name: Decrease Input State
resourcedefs.description: Indicates a decrease control action.

resourcedefs.name: Up Counter
resourcedefs.description: Counts the number of times the increase control has been operated. Writing a 0 resets the counter.

resourcedefs.name: Down Counter
resourcedefs.description: Counts the times the decrease control has been operated. Writing a 0 resets the counter.

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

name: multiple Axis Joystick
description: This IPSO object can be used to report the position of a shuttle or joystick control. A digital input is provided to report the state of an associated push button.

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input State
resourcedefs.description: The current state of a digital input.

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input Counter
resourcedefs.description: The number of times the input transitions from 0 to 1.

resourcedefs.name: X Value
resourcedefs.description: The measured value along the X axis.

resourcedefs.name: Y Value
resourcedefs.description: The measured value along the Y axis.

resourcedefs.name: Z Value
resourcedefs.description: The measured value along the Z axis.

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

name: Rate
description: This object type should be used to report a rate measurement, for example the speed of a vehicle, or the rotational speed of a drive shaft. It also provides resources for minimum and maximum measured values, as well as the minimum and maximum range that can be measured by the sensor.An example measurement unit is Feet per Second (ucum:ft_us/s).

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Value
resourcedefs.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Units
resourcedefs.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. Rate, example units = Feet per Second

resourcedefs.name: Min Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.name: Max Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

resourcedefs.name: Min Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Max Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Reset Min and Max Measured Values
resourcedefs.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

resourcedefs.name: Current Calibration
resourcedefs.description: Read or Write the current calibration coefficient

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case

name: Push button
description: This IPSO object is used to report the state of a momentary action push button control and to count the number of times the control has been operated since the last observation.

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input State
resourcedefs.description: The current state of a digital input.

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input State
resourcedefs.description: The number of times the input transitions from 0 to 1.

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

name: Multi-state Selector
description: This IPSO object is used to represent the state of a Multi-state selector switch with a number of fixed positions.

resourcedefs.name: Multi-state Input
resourcedefs.description: The current state of a Multi-state input or selector.

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.
